title: Science Museum Collections Online
description: A revamp of an open-source API, and frontend, used by hobbyists, researchers, and developers alike to explore a diverse collection.

title: Portfolio
description: You're on this right now! Built in 2022 and overhauled as part of my bootcamp at The Jump Digital School.

title: Marriage Saver
description: An app to reminder you of your spouse's special occasions. Built in a team of 5 in 6 hours as part of The Jump's Hackathon. Expect a reminder countdown, todo list, compliment generator and email reminders

title: Glimpses
description: A freelance project for an arts website for an organisation of art curators in Europe

title: I heart Film
description: A freelance website for an organisation of film producers based in Bahrain. An eye catching grid of videos and use of the vimeo api were fun to build on this project

title: Black Boxes
description: A freelance Website for a digital art project called Black Boxes, which I built out the homepage and grid layouts for, including a scrolling ticker tape style line of words
